subject: Re: Pay on Success (Activation Fee change)

Thank you Joel

Hi Danielle,

We have updated the Pay on success from 20 to 15. The previously accepted proposal will still reflect 20% upfront.

Hi Joel, Could you please update the quote platform for Melbourne for us? The activation fee for Pay on Success product is now 15% instead of 20%, the same as Sydney. You will need to update;
  • The details on the link that is sent to clients, when they are asked to select their payment method the Pay on Success box.
  • Also, so the T&C's pop-up box if the client clicks through has 20% into it.
I cannot see any reference to the exact upfront percentage on the website-which means no changes to be made there. Please let me know once this has been completed. Thank you, Danielle Gerlach BUSINESS MANAGER 0437 320 704 | dgerlach@novaricollective.com 03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195 novaricollective.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Could you please update the quote platform for Melbourne for us?

The activation fee for Pay on Success product is now 15% instead of 20%, the same as Sydney.

You will need to update;
  • The details on the link that is sent to clients, when they are asked to select their payment method the Pay on Success box.
  • Also, so the T&C's pop-up box if the client clicks through has 20% into it.
I cannot see any reference to the exact upfront percentage on the website-which means no changes to be made there.

Please let me know once this has been completed.

Thank you,
